articles.author: ROD MCGUIRK
articles.title: Australia plans a social media ban for children under 16 - The Associated Press
articles.description: The Australian government announced on Thursday what it described as world-leading legislation that would set an age limit of 16 years for children to start using social media, and hold platforms responsible for ensuring compliance. Prime Minister Anthony Alb…
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) The Australian government announced on Thursday what it described as world-leading legislation that would institute an age limit of 16 years for children to start using soci… [+4793 chars]
